title: Remove Hardcoded Titles - Load from localStorage Only
description: Replace hardcoded H1 and subtitle with placeholders that are filled by applyWhitelabelTitles() from localStorage. This ensures NO hardcoded UI text - only values from persistent storage.
reasoning: User requirement: ZERO hardcoded text in HTML
Current state: H1 shows 'PROGRESSIA 路 Discord Project 路 [ Project Type ]' and subtitle 'Advance by Business Unit' as hardcode
Problem: Even if whitelabel config in localStorage is empty, these defaults still show
Solution: Use empty placeholder divs with IDs, populated by applyWhitelabelTitles() function
Result: Only shows text if it exists in localStorage; otherwise shows nothing
